title: irabEku iradira
sahitya:
irabEku iradira bEku


anupallavi

  samsAradi janakAdi rAja rSigaLante


caraNam 1    mithilA paTTaNavu dahisidembuda kELi mithilEsha "mama kincinna dahyate" embande
    caraNam 2    dadhIci rSi tanna asti surarigittu madhuvairi vaikuNTha puravitta teradante
    caraNam 3    purandara viTTalanna dAsara sangaDa putra mitra kaLatra bandhugaLante
